description: Listed only by Irwin, who says: A String of 8' on the manuals, with a timbre less keen and bright than that of the Gamba. This is not necessarily a soft stop. It may be conical or just the top halves may be conical.
examplesDescription: Muted Gamba 8, Choir-Swell; Convention Hall, Atlantic City, New Jersey, USA; Midmer-Losh 1929-32.

examples.name: Muted Gamba 8, Choir-Swell; Convention Hall, Atlantic City, New Jersey, USA; Midmer-Losh 1929-32.
